verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's new lawyer Rudy Giuliani] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that Trump repaid his personal attorney Michael Cohen for a $ 130,000 payment to Stormy Daniels] .
President Donald Trump 's new lawyer Rudy Giuliani said Wednesday that [ARG0: Trump] [V: repaid] [ARG2: his personal attorney Michael Cohen] [ARG3: for a $ 130,000 payment to Stormy Daniels] .
